name: Global Colloquium on Pharmaceutical Drug Research and Industry Field Innovations
content: We cordially invite you to the conference and looking forward to your participation!! A Scient Global heartily invites you to the “Pharmaceutical Drug Research and Industry Field Innovations” scheduled to be held on November 25-26, 2019 Singapore is your single best opportunity to reach the largest assemblage of participants from all over the globe who are focused on learning about Pharmaceutics and its advancements. The theme of the conference is “Medicinal Research Opportunities and Innovative developments in Pharma Industry”.
